scripts.bootstrap: f () { npm ci && lerna bootstrap --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} && npm run build:travis && lerna link ;}; f
scripts.start: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run start ;}; f
scripts.serve: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run serve ;}; f
scripts.build: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run build ${@:2} ;}; f
scripts.build:travis: lerna exec -- sudo npm run build:travis
scripts.test: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run test ;}; f
scripts.test:eslint: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run test:eslint ;}; f
scripts.test:stylelint: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run test:stylelint ;}; f
scripts.test:mocha: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run test:mocha ;}; f
scripts.deploy: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run deploy ;}; f
scripts.deploy:clean: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run deploy:clean ${@:2} ;}; f
scripts.deploy:folder: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run deploy:folder ${@:2} ;}; f
scripts.deploy:staging: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run deploy:staging ;}; f
scripts.deploy:production: f () { lerna exec --scope deriv-${1:-'*'} -- npm run deploy:production ;}; f
